KPlugin.Description: Adds space around windows touching a screen edge or other window (updated by Claudio Catterina for Plasma 6 with some minor additional tweaks by Fred McDavid for border management improvements...NOTE that this has been forked from the original version that appears to have been abandoned.  Please see https://github.com/FredworkLemmas/kwin-tile-gaps for the latest version of this script.  Thanks!)
KPlugin.Description[de]: Fügt Zwischenraum um Fenster ein, die einen Bildschirmrand oder ein anderes Fenster berühren
KPlugin.Name: Window Gaps
